Class PowerMonitorService

EnergyPerformance.Services

EnergyPerformance.dll

Hosted Service that monitors the power usage of the system, with periodic reporting every second.

public class PowerMonitorService : BackgroundService, IHostedService, IDisposable, IPowerMonitorService
